Troubleshooting computer problems

Via foieGras:

There can be issues getting compilers to work properly, especially on M1 Macs. Often, this is due to missing or incorrect Xcode Command Line Tools and/or Fortran compiler. If you encounter install and compile issues, you may find a solution in the excellent documentation here glmmTMB.

Another good resource for foieGras-specific technical problems is the ‘Issues’ page of the GitHub repo.
